title: Everything you Shall Earn in the Future Would be Thrown Away by Me - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Shoujo   Slice of Life   Tragedy
tags: Abusive Characters   Academy   Age Regression   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Revenge   Second Chance   Villainess Noble Girls
author: Otonashi Satsuki   音無砂月
description:
Her cousin, Aries, was a baron’s daughter. However, her parents died in a carriage accident. Therefore, she was adopted by the Duke of Lark.

Her father, Adley, loved Aries more than his own daughter—Sofia. Not to mention, Sofia’s fiance also favored Aries, who was more innocent and unconventional than the quiet and gloomy Sofia.

Finally, Sofia’s fiance, Prince Wagner Vidal, annulled their engagement. Aries subsequently became Wagner’s new fiancee.

Afterwards, Sofia, whose reputation as a noble lady had been tarnished, was proposed to by a viscount. The life that awaited Sofia was a miserable one—where she was abused every day. After she drew her last breath, she thought that the hell was finally over.

However, time rewound to before Aries got adopted into her family.

Not wanting to go through that miserable life again, Sofia struggled to change her destiny.>
